units.report: TF 436 snooped by Japanese Fighter Bomber at 77,61 near Hong Kong
E13A1 Jake has spotted a BPB 60' MTB class MTB at 77,61

Morning Air attack on Hong Kong Fortress, at 77,61 (Hong Kong)
 
Weather in hex: Clear sky
 
Raid detected at 107 NM, estimated altitude 18,000 feet.
Estimated time to target is 37 minutes
 
Japanese aircraft
      Ki-27b Nate x 7
      Ki-36 Ida x 27
      Ki-44 Tojo x 6
      Ki-51 Sonia x 24
 
No Japanese losses
 
Aircraft Attacking:
      24 x Ki-51 Sonia bombing from 15000 feet
               Ground Attack:  4 x 50 kg GP Bomb
      27 x Ki-36 Ida bombing from 15000 feet
               Ground Attack:  4 x 30 kg GP Bomb

Afternoon Air attack on TF, near Hong Kong at 77,61
 
Weather in hex: Clear sky
 
Raid spotted at 9 NM, estimated altitude 20,000 feet.
Estimated time to target is 2 minutes
 
Japanese aircraft
      Ki-21-IIa Sally x 15
 
No Japanese losses
 
Allied Ships
      DD Thracian

      15 x Ki-21-IIa Sally bombing from 15000 feet
               Naval Attack:  4 x 250 kg SAP Bomb

E13A1 Jake from Ashigara-1  has spotted a BPB 60' MTB class MTB at 77,61
